short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Manage a ton of tabs with dividers and collapsible groups

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Divider Tabs helps you manage lots of tabs by using the model of a 3-ring binder:
 - click the Divider Tabs icon next to the address bar to insert a named, color-coded Divider Tab to separate groups of related tabs
 - the Divider Tab contains a hyperlinked index of all the tabs in that group
 - click the colored chip on a Divider Tab to close all tabs in the group... click again to restore.
 - you can use the keyboard shortcut Alt+D to set focus back to the nearest Divider Tab
